alert.note: Alert for Glorieta Mesa Including Glorieta Pass; Southwest Mountains; Upper Rio Grande Valley; West Central Mountains; West Central Plateau (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 17 at 3:29PM MST until January 18 at 12:00AM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT MST TONIGHT... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations up to 2 inches, mostly above 8,000 feet. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Glorieta Mesa Including Glorieta Pass, Upper Rio Grande Valley, Southwest Mountains, West Central Mountains, and West Central Plateau. * WHEN...Until Midnight MST tonight. * IMPACTS...Plan on snow packed or icy road conditions. This includes portions of I-40. The hazardous conditions could impact the Tuesday evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions, dial 511 or 1.800.432.4269, or visit http://nmroads.com.

area.areaDesc: Glorieta Mesa Including Glorieta Pass; Southwest Mountains; Upper Rio Grande Valley; West Central Mountains; West Central Plateau
